(For anyone who cares, I shall be returning fully to my duties when football 
practice is over.  We will be having 11 or so games, two every week.  First 
one ain't till the 20th of September, so I should be back in late October)

Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:



Nemesis Enforcer walked down a dark corridor towards his quarters.  It was 
late, and he could use a night recharging on his recharge bed.  About to 
round a corner, a figure jumped around the corner.

"Agh!" Nemesis yelled in surprise, jumping back a yard, energy blade 
extended.  The blade acting like a lamp, Nemesis was able to make out the 
body of Stalker, the robot Soundwave had turned into, only, Stalker's head 
was missing, and in its place, was DeathStorm's.  That meant one thing.

"Scattershot!  You dolt!  I could've killed you!  And I should still kill 
you!"

"Why don't you try?  My new armor makes me invincible!"

"What?"

"I WILL RULE THE MILKY WAY UNIVERSE!" he screamed, running towards Nemesis 
Enforcer.  The second-in-command of the Alliance stepped to the side, letting 
the other psychotic bot run off, cackling madly.

Nemesis shook his head.  "Four out of five voices in my head say to kill him. 
 And the fifth one is starting to concur with the others..." he growled 
slightly, walking down the corridor once more.
